title: How to Grow Rock Lily

steps.headline: Find a suitable location.
steps.description: Rock lily should get ample sunshine throughout the day. Partial shade is okay but avoid full shade of the rock lily will refuse to flower.

steps.headline: Plant in a container pot.
steps.description: Add coarse bark chips for grip. Alternatively, if you have a rockery in your garden, tie the rock lily to the rocks (or tree branches/stumps) and leave to grow naturally.

steps.headline: Nourish using liquid fertiliser every month during the warm months.

text: Find a suitable location. Rock lily should get ample sunshine throughout the day. Partial shade is okay but avoid full shade of the rock lily will refuse to flower. Plant in a container pot. Add coarse bark chips for grip. Alternatively, if you have a rockery in your garden, tie the rock lily to the rocks (or tree branches/stumps) and leave to grow naturally. Water frequently during hot weather.  Nourish using liquid fertiliser every month during the warm months.
